name: Notion Life OS v2.0

features: Automate: Streamline your life; Organize: Yanage your life; Track: Monitor your progress; Simplify: Reduce complexity; Connect: Link databases for more automation; Analyze: identify your weaknesses; Visualize: Gain clarity; Personalize: Customize to your needs
